Game.Name: Penguin- Elite Penguin Force - Herbert's Revenge
Game.Plot: Unravel Herbert's Mischievous Plans! Continue your adventures as an Elite Penguin Force Agent, solving all new mysteries and missions and playing exclusive mini-games in the thrilling Elite Penguin Force DS sequel. Uncover Herbert P. Bear's latest antics on your DS! Play alone or with friends, earn coins that can be used in the online world and unlock special items online. • Take on the role of an Elite Penguin Force agent to complete 10 top secret missions • Play all new exclusive DS mini-games
